description: A collection of identically flavored beverages. For instance, all packages of Bud Light would be grouped under the Bud Light brand, but separated from packages of Bud Light Lime.

glasswareID.description: A unique identifier for differentiating glassware objects

imageURL.description: A path to the glassware's image.

name.description: A name for the glassware, e.g. Pint Glass.

items.description: A beverage product that may be purchased.

itemID.description: A unique identifier for differentiating item objects.

brandName.description: The name of the item's parent brand.

inventoryCount.description: The number of items currently in stock. Specify 0 for out of stock or unavailable items and -1 for unknown.

name.description: A name for the item displayable to the user.

popularityRating.description: An arbitrary float representing how popular this item is. Items with greater popularityRatings will sort to the top by default.

brandID.description: A unique IDused to differentiate brand objects

alcoholContent.description: The percentage of alchol in the brand's products.

family.description: An optional grouping for similar brands, for instance, Bud Light Lime and Bud Light may share a brand family.

foodPairing.description: Suggested foods to consume along with the brand.

marketingCopy.description: Marketing copy for the brand displayed in Brand Details.

romanceCopy.description: A succinct description of the brand displayed in Product Ordering.

servingTemperature.description: The ideal condition to serve the brand's products.

sortOrder.description: Used to set the displayed order of brands in the app. Brands are sorted in ascending sortOrder.

style.description: The beer style of the brand, for instance, Indian Pale Ale.

trueBrewer.description: The actual brewer of the beer.

imageURL.description: A url or path to a local file.
